content:
As a freelance designer, I am based in Indonesia and am therefore only available to work during Indonesia timezone. However, I understand that many of my clients may be based in different timezones, including the US. In these cases, I am able to adjust my schedule and work during the US timezone to ensure that I am available to communicate and collaborate with my clients. This may involve working late evenings or early mornings to accommodate the time difference.

Overall, while I am only available to work during Indonesia timezone, I am flexible and willing to adjust my schedule to meet the needs of my clients in different timezones.
